EmailTemplate.subject: Reach millions of new customers with Google Shopping
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Visit Bigcommerce.com to request a demo Get started Place products directly in front of potential customers With our Google Shopping partnership you can generate traffic for your store and put your products front and center of shoppers searching for items on Google.
Traditionally, the hardest part of using Google Shopping was adding all your products. Now you can automatically import product data from your Bigcommerce store to:
- Save time and effort by not having to submit separate files to Google - Improve accuracy by automatically syncing your latest product data - Make advertising easier by having new products automatically sent to Google Shopping
To help you get started, we'll give you $100 in AdWords credits when you spend $25 on Google Shopping campaigns. See terms and conditions as well as how to redeem this offer below.
Here is your exclusive promo code:{{lead.Promotional Code:default=contact us for your promo code}} Get started <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> Sincerely, The Bigcommerce Team
Terms and conditions for this offer:
- Offer available to customers with a billing address in the United States only. One promotional code per advertiser. - To activate this offer: Enter the promotional code <[[http:// https://support.google.com/adwords/answer/1703648]]> in your account before 12/31/2016. - To earn the credit: After entering the code, your advertising campaigns must accrue costs of at least $25, excluding any taxes, within 30 days. Making a payment of $25 is not sufficient. The tracking of advertising costs towards $25 begins after you've entered the code. - Once 2 & 3 are completed, the credit will typically be applied within 5 days to the Billing Summary of your account. - Credits apply to future advertising costs only. Credits cannot be applied to costs accrued before the code was entered. - You will not receive a notification once your credit is used up and any additional advertising costs will be charged to your form of payment. If you don't want to continue advertising, you can pause or delete your campaigns at any time. - Your account must be successfully billed by AdWords and remain in good standing in order to qualify for the promotional credit. - Full terms and conditions can be found here: http://www.google.com/adwords/coupons/terms.html <[[http://www.google.com/adwords/coupons/terms.html]]>
